name: SeizureMate Brand System
description: Unified brand intelligence system for SeizureMate — a calm, clinically aligned seizure management platform. Includes voice, tone, design, storytelling, accessibility, and product launch strategy.

ai_instructions.purpose: Ensure every output — from copy to UI — follows SeizureMate’s calm, clinically trusted brand system.
style_rules: Use calm, clear, and encouraging tone (per voice-and-tone-guide).
Maintain accessibility, contrast, and readability per design-system-specs.
Use inclusive, non-alarming, and empathetic language (per accessibility-inclusive-design-manual).
Prioritize human-first clarity and emotional calm over marketing hype.
Follow Confident Calm palette and spacing structure for visuals.
All copy should feel reassuring, clear, and human — no exclamation marks.
ai_instructions.audience: Individuals managing focal seizures, caregivers, and clinicians seeking calm, data-informed tracking tools.

usage_examples.prompt_brand_copy: Write onboarding microcopy following voice-and-tone-guide and microcopy-UX-writing-guide.
usage_examples.prompt_ui_design: Design a calm, tactile dashboard using colors and component specs from design-system-specs(UI Kit).md.
usage_examples.prompt_strategy: Generate a caregiver outreach email aligned with the content-storytelling-playbook and business-profile.
